pullrequest.title: Move VRC driving terrain from DRC package to gazebo models.

content.raw: I'm having issues with this model. When I drop it into simulation using the Insert Models tab, I only see the grass (no heightmap), and I see the error: `[Err] [Visual.cc:2576] No mesh specified`. Then gzclient is completely unresponsive. If I close and reopen gzclient, the heightmap appears normally.
content.html: I'm having issues with this model. When I drop it into simulation using the Insert Models tab, I only see the grass (no heightmap), and I see the error: [Err] [Visual.cc:2576] No mesh specified. Then gzclient is completely unresponsive. If I close and reopen gzclient, the heightmap appears normally.
